options.negatives: (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad anatomy), extra digit, fewer digits, (extra arms:1.2), bad hands, by (bad-artist:0.6), bad-image-v2-39000, NSFW, nipples, loli, child, children, shota, boy, male, men, man,
options.prompts: detailed background, masterpiece, best quality, 1girl, laser, bullets, bullet hell, funny hat,

comments.guild_id: Default ID for your guild (discord server). 0 is an invalid ID.
comments.log_file_cnt: Number of logfiles to cycle through.  e.g. you could have 5 files each 32 MB.
comments.managers: How many job mangers to spawn.  Each manager oversees an independent job queue.
comments.max_bytes: Maximum size of a logfile, measured in Bytes.
comments.options: All the configurable parameters for requests to the Stable Diffusion engine.

queue_opts.depth: How many jobs can be in the queue.
queue_opts.job_cooldown: How many seconds to delay before starting another job (in case your computer cates fire).
queue_opts.job_count: How many job tasks to spawn.  Each job gets a signle queue object to send to the SD engine.
queue_opts.max_guilds: Max guilds to serve at a time, if you want to limit that.
queue_opts.max_guild_reqs: How many requests can be submitted by a single guild.  Stops a single guild from spamming the bot.
queue_opts.post_cooldown: How many seconds to delay before accepting a new job request form a guild.  Also limits guild spam.

comments.test_guild_id: Default ID for your test/sandbox guild (discord server). 0 is an invalid ID.
